title: Random Character Generation
content: I have a client that wants me to create a font from Illustrator files with 2 alternate characters and turn it into a typeable font such that a different alternate character in generated every time you press a certain key. Does anyone know how this can be accomplished or wether it's possible?
author: logosam

comments.content: You can use contextual alternates to accomplish random look: [Opentype Random Contextual Alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023161321/http:/typophile.com/node/19625).
